dcterms:creator: Jiahua Liu

dcterms:description: A cross-lingual open-domain question answering dataset consisting of a training set in English and development and test sets in eight other languages, designed to support research in cross-lingual OpenQA.
dcterms:title: XQA
dcterms:language: English, Chinese, French, German, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Tamil, Ukrainian
